Eligibility Criteria

Suggested income limits

  • 1 person: $25,000
  • couple: $30,000 + $2,000 per additional dependant
  • 1 adult with 1 child: $30,000 + $2,000 per additional dependant

Do not prepare

  • deceased people
  • bankrupt people
  • people with capital gains/losses, self-employed or rental income or with employment income
  • with investment income exceeding $1,000
  • with business income larger than $1,000 and HST
